summary: Phase 8 Hardening security features testing completed. Backend security APIs working correctly including rate limiting, brute force protection, and security management endpoints. Frontend login flow functional with proper error handling for security violations.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for successful registration

rate_limiting_interaction.issue: Rate limiting (10 req/min) triggers before brute force protection (5 attempts) in rapid testing
rate_limiting_interaction.impact: This is actually good security - multiple protection layers

passed_tests: Admin login with valid credentials (admin@test.com / test123)
Rate limiting on login endpoint - triggers after 6 attempts with 429 status
Security configuration endpoint - returns all expected settings
Locked accounts endpoint - shows currently locked accounts
Unlock account endpoint - successfully unlocks accounts
Session timeout configuration - properly set to 30 minutes
Frontend login flow - successful authentication and navigation
Brute force protection in browser - account locked message displayed
